text: The 2019–20 Cypriot First Division was the 81st season of the Cypriot top- level football league. On 15 May 2020, the league was abandoned due to COVID-19 pandemic. The title was not awarded, and no teams were relegated, with the league expanded to 14 teams next season for a transitional year. ==Teams== ===Promotion and relegation (pre-season)=== Alki Oroklini and Ermis Aradippou were relegated at the end of the first-phase of the 2018–19 season after finishing in the bottom two places of the table. The relegated teams were replaced by 2018–19 Second Division champions Ethnikos Achna and runners- up Olympiakos Nicosia. ===Stadiums and locations=== :Note: Table lists clubs in alphabetical order. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! In order to preserve chronological progress, any postponed matches are not included in the round at which they were originally scheduled, but added to the full round they were played immediately afterwards. For example, if a match is scheduled for matchday 13, but then postponed and played between days 16 and 17, it will be added to the standings for day 16. ==Championship round== ===Championship round table=== ===Results=== ===Positions by Round=== The table lists the positions of teams after each week of matches. ==Relegation round== ===Relegation round table=== ===Results=== ===Positions by Round=== The table lists the positions of teams after each week of matches. ==Season statistics== ===Top scorers=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !Player !Club !Goals |- !1 |align="left"| Ivan Trichkovski |align="left"|AEK Larnaca |20 |- !rowspan="2"|2 |align="left"| Kingsley Onuegbu |align="left"|Nea Salamis Famagusta |rowspan="2"|14 |- |align="left"| Rayo |align="left"|Anorthosis Famagusta |- !4 |align="left"| Matt Derbyshire |align="left"|Omonia |13 |- !5 |align="left"| Emilio Zelaya |align="left"|Apollon Limassol |8 |- !rowspan="6"|6 |align="left"| Serge Gakpé |align="left"|Apollon Limassol |rowspan="6"|6 |- |align="left"| Linus Hallenius |align="left"|APOEL |- |align="left"| Nika Katcharava |align="left"|Anorthosis Famagusta |- |align="left"| Ibrahim Koneh |align="left"|Ethnikos Achna |- |align="left"| Giorgos Merkis |align="left"|APOEL |- |align="left"| Demetris Theodorou |align="left"|Enosis Neon Paralimni |- |} ==References== ==External links== Category:Cypriot First Division seasons Cyprus Category:2019–20 in Cypriot football Cypriot First Division
